name: Jackalwere
movement: 40 feet walking speed allowing quick assaults
description: The Jackalwere is a Medium-sized fiend that can shift into a Small jackal or a humanoid form, embodying chaotic evil tendencies. It has a sleek, cunning appearance, often adorned with a deceptive aura.
memorable: Its ability to charm and incapacitate foes with a dangerous gaze and its reliance on deceit make it particularly treacherous.
goals: To deceive and ambush unsuspecting foes while leveraging its shapeshifting capabilities in combat.
relations: Often found working with other fiends or in packs to exploit its Pack Tactics ability.
environment: Typically lurks in desolate areas, often preying on those who wander into its territory.
strengths: Good at stealth and deception, enhanced by its Pack Tactics and charm abilities.
weaknesses: Vulnerable to magical attacks and silvered weapons, which can bypass its damage resistance.
attacks: Bite attack from jackal or hybrid form dealing piercing damage and a scimitar attack in human form dealing slashing damage.
most_powerful_ability: The Sleep Gaze ability allows it to charm and potentially incapacitate opponents, impacting combat significantly.
senses: Keen Hearing and Smell grants it advantage on Perception checks related to these senses.
skills: Notable proficiency in Deception (+4), enhancing its ability to manipulate and lie to others.
additional_information: Has advantage on attack rolls through Pack Tactics when near allies.
Must succeed on a saving throw to make true statements, creating unintentional lies.
Damage resistance against nonmagical, non-silvered weapons provides decent protection.
Can quickly adapt its form for ambushes, showing strategic depth in encounters.
Fearless against mundane weapons but will retreat if outnumbered.
test_queries: deceptive fiend that can charm enemies
monster that uses dangerous gaze attack
sneaky fiend known for deceit and ambush
